mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (id, password, email, name, birthday, gender, phone, hobby, role, created_at, updated_at, delete_yn) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{email}, #{name}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{hobby}, #{role}, now(), now(), 'N');
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY CREATED_AT ASC
SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND ID = #{id}
